title: marudamalai vAsan
sahitya:
marudamalai vAsan muruganai dinam nI karudi varum dAsanAgi kaDait-tEriDu manamE


anupallavi

  kurai unadai oru murai kUrik-krpai kOrinAl karuNaiyoDu viraivil adu maraiya dayai purivAn


caraNam    hara hara murugA harOharA enak-kUri peruvAriyAna bhaktar varisaiyAi malaiyEri 
paravasham koNDu tan darishanam kaNDadum parivu koNDu annAr paDum iDar pOkkuvAn
